崡字的基本解释

崡
hán
山名。

崡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hán］
［《集韻》胡讒切，平咸，匣。］
即函谷。

崡字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　崡； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页314第30
【集韻】【韻會】?胡讒切，音咸。山名。肴陵。本作函。【賈誼·過秦論】秦孝公據崤函之阻。【註】崤謂崤山，函謂函谷。　又函谷，關名。漢在弘農。俗从山作崡。

崡字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　崡; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 314 30
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Hu slanderously cut, the sound is salty. Mountain name. Food mausoleum. This is a letter. [Jia Yi·Guo Qin Lun] Qin Xiaogong was obstructed by Weihan. [Note] Xiao is called Xiaoshan, and Han is called Hangu.　Hangu again, Guan Ming. Han is in Hongnong. The custom is made from the mountain.
